pkgmetadata.longdescription: axmlparser===========A simple parser to parse Android XML file.Usage======CLI :====.. code-block:: shell $ apkinfo ~/Downloads/com.hardcodedjoy.roboremo.15.apk APK: /home/chillaranand/Downloads/com.hardcodedjoy.roboremo.15.apk App name: RoboRemo Package: com.hardcodedjoy.roboremo Version name: 2.0.0 Version code: 15 Is it Signed: True Is it Signed with v1 Signatures: True Is it Signed with v2 Signatures: True Is it Signed with v3 Signatures: FalsePython package :================.. code-block:: python from pyaxmlparser import APK apk = APK('/foo/bar.apk') print(apk.package) print(apk.version_name) print(apk.version_code) print(apk.icon_info) print(apk.icon_data) print(apk.application)
